english name: A Show Where Magic and Invention Intertwine
japanese name: 魔法と発明が織りなすショー
skill name (english): Together, With This Magic of Smiles
skill effect (japanese): 7秒間 BAD以上がPERFECTになり、5秒間 スコアが100％UPする
skill effect (english): All BADs and higher will become PERFECTs for 7.0 seconds and 100% score boost for 5 seconds.
gacha phrase: 特別なショーをご覧あれ！
